headline: Datadog Announces Expanded Collaboration Agreement, Highlights New Capabilities with AWS Across AI, Observability and Security at AWS re:Invent
summary: Datadog signs new Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS, building on 10+ years of joint innovation and outcomes for customersLas Vegas, Nevada--(Newsfile Corp. - December 3, 2025) - Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications, today at AWS re:Invent announced a new strategic collaboration agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and showcased multiple product launches across AI, observability and security to help organizations running on..

headline: Datadog: Multiproduct Sales And AI Deals Underpin Strong Growth (Upgrade)
summary: Datadog stock is rated a "Buy" after impressive Q3 results and resilient growth driven by cloud security and multiproduct adoption. Learn more.

headline: Did Flywl’s Cloud Cost Integration Just Shift Datadog’s (DDOG) Enterprise Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Flywl announced a partnership with Datadog to integrate its unified cloud marketplace procurement platform, giving enterprises centralized visibility into Datadog usage, costs, licensing, and capacity across AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. By tying directly into Datadog’s APIs for real-time consumption, cost, and capacity insights, the alliance aims to help large customers avoid overages, sharpen budget planning, and improve chargeback accuracy across complex, multi-cloud...
